title: Latvia - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Latvia stands at A+ with stable outlook. Moody's credit rating for Latvia was last set at A3 with stable outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Latvia was last reported at A- with stable outlook. DBRS's credit rating for Latvia is A with stable outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Latvia thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Latvia as reported by major credit rating agencies.
